SQL.GetUserInfo: SELECT U.id, name, password, nickName, U.remarks, U.isDeleted, roleId, R.roleName FROM tbUser AS U LEFT JOIN tbRole AS R ON R.id = U.roleId WHERE U.name = @name AND U.[password] = @password AND U.isDeleted = 0
SQL.ListUserPagination: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.id DESC) AS rowNo, A.id, name, nickName, A.remarks, roleId, B.roleName, A.isDeleted, password FROM tbUser AS A LEFT JOIN tbRole AS B ON B.id = A.roleId WHERE @searchString IS NULL OR name LIKE '%' + @searchString + '%' OR nickName LIKE '%' + @searchString + '%' OR B.roleName LIKE '%' + @searchString + '%'
